markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Xulgath Skulker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3245)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Xulgath warrens are patrolled—some might say “haunted”—by the community's skulkers. These xulgaths specialize in stealth, striking swiftly from the shadows and otherwise ambushing foes.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Xulgath_Skulker.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Xulgath Skulker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3245)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
<trait label="Xulgath" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=781" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 353 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Sakvroth](/Languages.aspx?ID=118)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (4)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +5 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 28

</row>

**[Stench](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=76)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=664)) 30 feet, DC 16

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +9,
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Hidden Movement**   If a xulgath skulker starts their turn [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=96) by a creature or merely [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=79) from it, that creature is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) against the skulker's attacks until the end of the skulker's turn.

**Mask Stench** <actions string="Free Action" />  The stalker masks their stench with curated herbs, suppressing their stench aura. The skulker can resume their stench aura as a free action.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   A xulgath skulker deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-486" />
name: Xulgath Skulker

text: Xulgath Skulker Xulgath warrens are patrolled—some might say “haunted”—by the community's skulkers. These xulgaths specialize in stealth, striking swiftly from the shadows and otherwise ambushing foes. Mask Stench Free Action The stalker masks their stench with curated herbs, suppressing their stench aura. The skulker can resume their stench aura as a free action. Sneak Attack A xulgath skulker deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to off-guard creatures.
